posts.post_content: I hate to do this but there is a red dot i want to buy for my ar-15. I have a 1911 t3 art devlin sgc auth a very nice card and i dont know why its a auth it measures correct and looks to be no added color but im not a grader. I want $130 shipped for it thats what i paid. Great looking card thats 100 years old. I dont know how to post pics on here but will send scans if requested. thanks
